name: Millidor
description:
Millidor is a global customer online strategy with RPG elements according to the best traditions of the classical fantasy. Here you can become the ruler of your kingdom - a stern and oppressive fighter or a tactful dealer - it's only your choice! Your hero, avatar, is a founder of the new empire, whose duties include expansion of borders and strengthening of own position on the world map.
Thus, the world map is not constant and static. New castles arise on recently empty spaces, new resource deposits are opened and the old fields run out, and neutral squads and armies from the neighbouring countries intrude into your territory. Be ready to rebuff them! And don't hesitate to resort to your allies, as there is no war without diplomacy. In Millidor, you can become a part of the historical alliance with fascinating past and bright future, or found your own union to follow the chosen way whenever you want to.
Free the thirst for adventures concealed in you! Register and start playing Millidor!

Game features:
- Selection of one of six races, each having its advantages and unique units.
- Interactive game world - locations vary, new castles, resources, enemy squads arise. Lands that are free and deserted today can bring you new resources tomorrow or become the property of a new owner.
- Tactics in battle and on the world map - competent use of the landscape advantages and global spells will help you dominate in battles.
- Numerous PVP actions - tactical fights, sieges of castles, and capture of provinces. Thoughtful step-by-step battles which can be controlled manually.
- System of associations - detailed political model and universal social relations with possibility to enter alliances and to reach new ranks.
- Territory control - consecutive expansion of lands and struggle for deposits of critical importance with other players.
- Plenty of subjects - hiring of archaeologists for finding the rare artefacts which can be sold or used for the benefit of your kingdom.
- Craft and alchemy - successful Alchemical experiences will allow to improve the found artefacts and get powerful economic and battle advantages.
- There are six Divine patrons loyalty from which is the best support and assistance in all spheres of the game.
- Improvement of skills - participation in battles enables to increase Avatar's level and its characteristics. Once a new level is achieved you can choose some battle and economic skills promoting success in the game essentially.
- Six schools of magic: Air, Water, Fire, Earth, Life, Death.
There are various spells in the game: instant and long-term, directed on damaging or weakening the enemy. You can learn spells, create unique Rolls, and apply them both on the World map and during the battle.
- Science development - learning of different scientific lines helps you increase extraction of resources, opens access to new constructions, boosts weapon manufacture rate, efficiency of alchemy and archaeology.
